metadata.name: Shikogabana Genesis 1/3
metadata.description: As Tarik Chebli’s genesis NFT, Shikogabana I brings to life Tarik’s popular depiction of ethereal nature. “Inspired by the lake in Northern Japan with fish swimming in clear water, it is a heavenly representation of a perfect world where Man has no place to disturb or destroy nature's wonders.” This work was a part of Art Dubai Digital 2022 represented by the online gallery Emergeast.
